definition: to lower/to decrease/to reduce/to subtract/to diminish
fat/fertile/loose-fitting or large/to fertilize/to become rich by illegal means/fertilizer/manure

sentences.english: Even weight-loss surgery doesn't always help people maintain their more svelte physiques.
sentences.chinese: 即使減肥手術也並不能讓人永遠保持苗條的體型。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the traditional Chinese medicine slimming capsule of the role of weight loss.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察複方中藥減肥膠囊的減肥作用。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the traditional Chinese medicine slimming capsule of the role of weight loss.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察複方中藥減肥膠囊的減肥作用。

sentences.english: This product has the lipid, promoted whitening, reduce weight of the health care function.
sentences.chinese: 本品具有調節血脂，去斑美白，減肥的保健作用。

sentences.english: Nowadays weight-losing has become popular among young and middle-aged women.
sentences.chinese: 當今女性減肥已成爲一種時尚。

sentences.english: Weight loss is a taboo to eat before going to bed.
sentences.chinese: 減肥的一大忌就是在睡覺前喫東西。

sentences.english: I'm getting a double chin. I'd better lose some weight.
sentences.chinese: 我雙下巴越來越明顯，最好減肥。

sentences.english: You need to exercise and lose some weight.
People usually lose weight quite quickly when they take orlistat.
sentences.chinese: 服用奧利司他膠囊，減肥迅速。

sentences.english: As a result, seaweed food with strange anti-obesity .
sentences.chinese: 因此，海藻類食物具有奇特的減肥功效。

sentences.english: To adiposity have very good clear grease effect reducing weight.
sentences.chinese: 對肥胖具有很好減肥清脂作用。

sentences.english: Adjustable gastric banding is the second most popular form of bariatric surgery.
sentences.chinese: 可調節胃紮帶手術是第二受歡迎的減肥手術。

sentences.english: Watch the calories, they count when you are trying to lose weight.
sentences.chinese: 看住卡路里，他在減肥過程中很重要。

sentences.english: Losing weight doesn’t have to be the priority with an overweight child.
sentences.chinese: 減肥並不一定是超重兒童的優先選擇。

sentences.english: Since she has lost weight that skirt bags on her.
sentences.chinese: 因爲她減肥了，她穿那條裙子顯得太鬆垂了。

sentences.english: You can spot reduce for tight abs or toned arms.
sentences.chinese: 你能恰好減肥到擁有緊縮的腹肌和優美的手臂。

definition: to save food/to go on a diet
to lower/to decrease/to reduce/to subtract/to diminish
to put on weight/to get fat
to persevere with/to persist in/to insist on
to toughen/to temper/to engage in physical exercise/to work out/(fig.) to develop one's skills/to train oneself
to have a meal/to eat/to make a living
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
